general_advisory: Bolangir district is likely to receive very light rain for upcoming 5 days with generally cloudy sky. Maximum temperature will be between 29-33°C and minimum temperature between 19-25°C. Maximum and minimum relative humidity will be 88-93% and 63-71% respectively. Wind speed will remain within 14 to 16 kmph for upcoming 5 days. Drain out excess water from certain crops, provide staking to vegetable plants, and spray insecticides or pesticides in crops as per requirement.

advisory: The crop is at active tillering stage. Favorable conditions for infestation by Yellow stem borer. Apply Cartap Hydrochloride or Chlorantraniliprole or Imidacloprid to manage stem borer.
Chilli crop is at seedling stage. Drench the soil with Mancozeb or foliar spray with Metalaxyl or Metalaxyl+Mancozeb to prevent damping off disease.

Brinjal is at flowering to fruiting stage. Favorable conditions for Shoot and fruit borer. Install pheromone traps and use chemical control like Emamectin Benzoate or Chlorantraniliprole to manage the pest.
